entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
